channel.title: Need help with router
channel.description: The guides say we need a rule for the router,to do that we need to go into the router and type the ip adress.Im doing TestScape so can someone help me? :confused:Please i need to know where the router is.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 04:22:31 PM[/size][hr]Help me.Cmon plz

item.title: Need help with router
item.dc:creator: @user123 user123
item.description:
@user123 wrote:

type in 192.168.1.1 usually. Then go to aplications and gaming or if u have port forwarding go there. Now click run and type in cmd then type ipconfig ur ip should be 192.168.. now put the ip adress in your router port forward and put the port. Also u must allow it in your firewall.

Read full topic
